description: django-C3PO is a Django application using C3PO - module responsible for converting .po files fromlocale folder with translations to .ods format and sending them to Google Spreadsheets.This Django application provides panel where user can synchronie translations with GDocs and it gives possibilityto push all translations on git and checkout last commit.
longdescription: django-C3PO is a Django application using C3PO - module responsible for converting .po files fromlocale folder with translations to .ods format and sending them to Google Spreadsheets.This Django application provides panel where user can synchronie translations with GDocs and it gives possibilityto push all translations on git and checkout last commit.
